00011 if (!defined('DS')) {
00012 /**
00013  * shortcut for / or \ (depending on OS)
00014  */
00015              define('DS', DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR);
00016 }
00017 if (!defined('ROOT')) {
00018              /**
00019               * absolute filesystem path to the root directory of this framework
00020               */
00021              define('ROOT',dirname(dirname(__FILE__)).DS);
00022 }
00023 if (!defined('WWW_ROOT')) {
00024              /**
00025               * absolute filesystem path to the webroot-directory of this framework
00026               */
00027              define('WWW_ROOT', ROOT.'webroot'. DS);
00028 }
00029 if (!defined('LIB')) {
00030              /**
00031               * absolute filesystem path to the lib-directory of this framework
00032               */
00033              define('LIB',ROOT.'lib'.DS);
